hadiths.text: It was nattated from Abu RAzin Al-'Uqayli that he said:"O Messenger of Allah! My father is an old man who cannot perform Hajj or 'Umrah, nor can he travel." He said "Perform Hajj and 'Umrah on behalf of your father

chapter.ara-name: باب الْعُمْرَةِ عَنِ الرَّجُلِ الَّذِي، لاَ يَسْتَطِيعُ
chapter.eng-name: 'Umrah On Behalf Of a Man Who Is Not Able To Do It
